item.title: Large fuel spillage, 5th November
item.description:
In our car park, a neighbour has leaked diesel all over the road! Cars driving through it and spreading over the road slippy and dangerous for motorbike riders If and when it rains this will make the roads more dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leycroft Gardens, Slade Green, London

item.title: Long-term rough sleeper camp on Town Hall steps (every night, for months), 5th November
item.description:
Hackney street enforcement seem to have not noticed the long-term rough sleeper camp on Town Hall steps (every night, for months). Please can enforcement prevent nightly rough sleeping on the steps to the Town Hall.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 5th November
item.description:
Why aren’t the landlords here held responsible for the rubbish that the tenants just dump in the street. I’ve lived here for 15 years, it has never been like this before. Disgusting and totally unacceptable. Used nappies all over the street and pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned ambulance (not marked as NHS), 5th November
item.description:
Abandone vehicle marked as ambulance (not NHS colours or markings, seem private company). It just appeared one night and has not moved for over 6 weeks now, no activity around it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southlands Grove, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big branches are dead and need cutting off before major accident, 5th November
item.description:
The tree is too large & needs trimming back- branches are too low, people duck to get under them. Two major branches are dead and need taking off before they fall off and hot someone. The tree is outside 131 Beaumont Road. The roots have caused a major misalignment of the pavement. Children fall of scooters and people's pram wheels get stuck - they have to lift it over the crevice. Don't want a repeat of Station Square in Petts wood where the tree fell down causing injury

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaumont Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, London

item.title: Chute blocked from flat 33 downwards, 5th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Person living in Parked Van, 5th November
item.description:
There has a person been living in a parked van for at least a couple of weeks parked in the same place outside of 94 Ulverscroft Road. Its a big white van with the number plate EK13 WPX. Its frightening some our local residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Ulverscroft Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Road markings, 5th November
item.description:
I have been involved in two accidents at the junction between Drummond Road & Clement's Road in the last year and half because of the road markings. Police turned up at the first accident over a year ago and said they have been called to numerous accidents at this junction, so I thought something might be done. Also its right by a school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drummond Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
